short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Decode and reveal the original URLs hidden behind obscure links encoded by URL Defense and Safe Links

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Click on this extension's icon to decode and reveal the original URLs hidden behind obscure links encoded by URL Defense and Safe Links.

The source code for this extension is available at https://github.com/francisyyan/url-restorer.
